actions.committee: House Committee on Banking, Currency and Housing
actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Banking, Currency and Housing.

official_title: A bill to amend the Housing and Community Development Act of 1974 with regard to the definition of the term "city" as it is used in that act.

summary.text: Expands the definition of the term "city" as it is used in the Housing and Community Development Act by eliminating the requirement that to fall within the definition no incorporated places must be contained within the boundaries of the city.

titles.title: A bill to amend the Housing and Community Development Act of 1974 with regard to the definition of the term "city" as it is used in that act.
